concept.title: Disabling Metrics for a Metrics Agent on the OpenStack Platform

section.p: To disable the monitoring of a specific metrics that is no longer needed in the configuration of a Metrics Agent, you have to delete the corresponding .yaml file.

note.p: The following step-by-step description refers to a Metrics Agent that you have installed on an OpenStack node. It is assumed that there is no need to disable metrics for the Metrics Agent used for monitoring itself.
